subject: EMI issue with vam pro and Simpson pro plus
description_text:
Hi,

I have a problem with my pedals. I use the van pro haptics but the break
and throttle pickup up a signal every time the motors are activated. I
already connected the grounding wire to the break which made it a little
better but it's not solved.

Without grounding wire and haptics at 30% - break will jump to 60-70% with
grounding wire still to 30%.

Is there anything I can do? I got the black ones is the grounding not
working properly because of the color?

I'm very happy with the pedals but can't use the haptics as is ATM.

Any quick fixes would be appreciated.

Kind regards,
Roman

conversations.body_text: Hi Roman Seibt,     You can refer to this post for a solution: by using nylon screws and nylon washers to isolate the VAM Pro from the mounting bracket, the issue can be effectively resolved.      https://www.reddit.com/r/simracing/comments/1n291hi/solution_for_simsonn_vam_pro_emi_issues/

Is there an easy way to source those screws and washers? I have no idea
where to get those.
